page.name: Frozen Claymore
page.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. The massive Claymore has had much of its power drained by the battle with Akriloth. Its powerful special will still help bring down your foes.

page.name: Vanilla Ice Katana
page.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. This delicate katana was crafted by Yulgar using the remaining shards of the Ice Scythe and the Ice Gems from the north. It smells faintly of vanilla....

page.name: ChaosMoon Slice VII
page.description:
Forged by a Ghostly DragonLord, the blade of the ChaosMoon is infused with the fire of the once mighty Akriloth.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: IceScythe
page.description: DragonMaster Frostscythe's infamous scythe, this wicked blade is carved from rock-solid ice. It's rumored the IceScythe has absorbed some of Frostscythe's own power. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Staff of Falconreach IX
page.description:
You got this weapon from the people of Falconreach in exchange for the Last Board of Falconreach, the only part of the town left after the attack of Xan!
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Mightiest 100k Scythe
page.description: This is purely a status symbol.  If you have this in your backpack, other players who haven't been able to get 100K gold will look at you in awe (and maybe wonder a little about your sanity.)
